attributes.action: Increase goverment funding for youth clubs!
attributes.additional_details: I have been at my youth club for months now! It is slowly but surely going to shut down. This is because of the lack of government funding to keep it open! By closing the youth club, there will be a number of dis-advantages. Do you want the children of England to be causing trouble when they're bored? Do you want them to stay outside in the freezing cold? Do you want them to not meet new people?!?! SIGN THIS NOW TO GET THE YOUTH CLUBS BACK ON TRACK! For our sake, for the kids sake....
